bot_chelper.isCreated: Do you have configured Telegram bot and token? [y]es/[n]o/[r]eset:
bot_chelper.creationInstruction:
1. Open Telegram
2. Type "botfather" in "Search" text input
3. Click "Start" and type "/newbot"
4. Choose a name for your bot (like BestBot, ending is always "bot")
5. Enter token here (token looks like 8748327:abuNCHofletTerS)
6. Done!
